trait.name: Helpful
entries: The expert can take the Help action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Tools
entries: The expert has {@item thieves' tools|phb} and a musical instrument.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Healer)
headerEntries: The spellcaster's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). The spellcaster has following cleric spells prepared:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Mage)
headerEntries: The spellcaster's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). The spellcaster has following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Magical Role
entries: Choose a role for the spellcaster: healer or mage. Your choice determines which Spellcasting trait to use below.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage, or 4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

trait.name: Martial Role
entries: The warrior has one of the following traits of your choice:

items.name: Attacker
items.entry: The warrior gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

items.name: Defender
items.entry: The warrior gains the Protection reaction below.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Protection (Defender Only)
entries: The warrior imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of it whose target isn't the warrior. The warrior must be able to see the attacker.
